title: These discussions
body: Does anyone actually ever post in them....? I really feel like I'm wasting my time asking for help here....

replies.body:
I've had a few problems fixed, and I've learned some common solutions to common issues, so I come here occasionally to help people with that.

But these boards seem pretty dried up. Shame that they got rid of the forums so hastily, that was a lot more active.

I'll be lurking in the meantime.
